subject: [LH] Conclusion
body:
As I promised you before I would give you my 
verdict
after enough time would have expired to let it all 
sink
in properly. I think 18 months is about right - so 
:
 
Aerial IS her best album.
 
For your information : it contains 5 great 
songs,
5 good songs, 3 reasonable songs and no bad 
songs.
 
(no, Aerial Tal is not a song - but quite enjoyable 
anyway).
 
Albert
